website_summaries.verdict: A well organized, strong wall mount that allows for easy access to the console.
pros: This mount is made from a stable iron material that you can rely on
The console rests on the mount without being locked into place, allowing easy access to your switch, should you want to remove it from the wall
Additional holes and hooks are designed to hold the controller and Joy-Cons in place
cons: The mount extends outward farther than most

customer_reviews.title: A good wall mount
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic wall mount. I have been uaing this for over a year and have had no problems with the mount itself. The weight can be a bit of a problem however. Over time the hole in the dry wall got bigger and it fell, luckily nothing was damaged. It may have been my old dry wall. Just be sure your mount is secured and check again every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Miharu Yoshizawa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wall mount for Switch
customer_reviews.text: VERY well built, just a solid piece of metal. Matches the dock perfectly, so it looks very nice. Appreciate the spot for the pro controller. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Mounting cables to the wall would secure the dock better but all in all
customer_reviews.text: The dock doesn't fasten into the mount but more sits in it. When my young son removes the console from the dock it slides forward on the mount. Mounting cables to the wall would secure the dock better but all in all, I am pleased with this as I feel it protects the dock and console better than having the dock sliding around on the media center surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Duvall

customer_reviews.title: This Switch holder was super easy to put together (some minimal assembly required) and ...
customer_reviews.text: This Switch holder was super easy to put together (some minimal assembly required) and very easy to mount. It keeps the kids Switch on teh wall, away for the cats!
customer_reviews.author: William Englefield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. So simple yet so function. Thank you so much for making this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elkif

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mount appears sturdy and should support the device if mounted safely to a stud. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mount for the price, lots of area for controllers and accessories. Extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan gaige

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together the and the quality is good is not flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Relik_

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit behind my wall mounted tv.
customer_reviews.text: Sticks out too far for the tv mount to sit flush. Would be fine if that’s not important to you.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Go with a name brand version
customer_reviews.text: This thing has 1 job and doesn't do it. The wall mount doesnt hold the switch to the wall the switch is loose and will fall for sure no instructions to refer to. Although seems simple enough put the screws in the wall and slide the swit h into the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Damionus

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Switch safe from little hands.
customer_reviews.text: The bracket does what I bought it for, it keeps my two year old from pulling my Nintendo Switch to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Wall Mount Bracket for Nintendo Switch
feature_bullets: Take advantage of unused wall space.Store Nintendo Switch Docking Station and game controllers on walls or other vertical surfaces.
Our mount prevents damage by keeping the Nintendo Switch Dock and game controllers secure to the wall and out of danger.
Simple setup. Install on wall using included screw.
One-year limited warranty.If any product issue, please contact us , we will try to satisfy your every needs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
